description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Insecure storage of LDAP passwords in the authentication functionality of AVSystem Unified Management Platform (UMP) 23.07.0.16567~LTS allows members (with read access to the application database) to decrypt the LDAP passwords of users who successfully authenticate to web management via LDAP.
